Â¿What is MOBILITYS.ME?

It is a company dedicated to the development and manufacture of equipment for technological training using neuroscience. Whether for professional athletes / athletes, high / medium performance, rehabilitation or entertainment. A dynamic and interactive activity for the brain and body with statistics

Which's our mission?

Move and motivate, facilitate a dynamic and interactive training environment, providing immediate information, through versatile solutions that amplify all forms of teaching and challenge people of all ages and physical abilities

Which's our vission?

Change the way human performance is measured by offering adaptive, measurable, interactive training solutions that improve the relationship between the body and the brain.

MOBLED

The Mobled contains 5 standard wireless satellites, one of them being the main control of the team that has 20 preloaded training programs.

Applications and benefits.

Sports:
* High performance specific sport
* Better reaction and response time
* Speed, agility, endurance and conditioning
* Coordination and visual cognitive processing functions
* Real-time sports performance analysis
Health:
* Motor control and coordination
* Increased mobility
* Versatility in the rehabilitation routine
* Applicable to a wide variety of injuries, groups and patients
Tactical:
* Reaction and response in training
* Human training analysis
* Training and dynamic orientation
* Accuracy and focus in real time
